introduction:
This page contains academic knowledge I have gathered from textbooks, official documents, and online resources, organized by myself.

My aim is to provide insights and supplementary information that may not be well-covered in common resources, helping to understand various topics.

This webpage is not intended to replace original sources or distract readers from school knowledge.

Due to limited time, only an English version is available for now.

Please note that errors may exist, and I would appreciate it if you could point them out. :)
